alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Fayette Ridges; Greene; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 18 at 4:03PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SNOW SHOWER WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN WESTMORELAND...SOUTHEASTERN GREENE...FAYETTE...MONONGALIA...PRESTON AND MARION COUNTIES... At 402 PM EST, a snow shower was located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Seven Springs to near Fairview. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. Winds in excess of 30 mph are possible with this snow shower. Locations impacted include... Morgantown, Fairmont, Uniontown, Connellsville, Westover, Kingwood, Mannington, Star City, Terra Alta, Rowlesburg, Scottdale, and Pleasant Valley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 68 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 31. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 84 and 100. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 10. Interstate 79 in West Virginia between mile markers 130 and 160. Visibilities will drop quickly to near a quarter of a mile in this snow shower. Icy roads are possible as the snow melts on the roads then quickly refreezes, especially in the higher terrain. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
